content: Princess Diana was motivated by her compassion and empathy to help those who were less fortunate, especially those who were affected by poverty, illness, and injustice. Her own personal experiences of struggling with mental health and marital issues also fueled her determination to raise awareness and support for people facing similar challenges. Additionally, she believed in using her celebrity status and platform to bring attention to important social issues and to inspire others to take action and make a difference in their communities.
